name: lee
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ S ] the side of hill, wall, etc. that provides shelter from the wind the lees [ plural ]
the substance that is left at the bottom of a container of liquid, especially a container of wine or beer: After several months, the wine is removed from the lees and placed into clean barrels.
